text: Pilosocereus arrabidae is a species of plant in the family Cactaceae. It is endemic to Brazil. Its natural habitats are rocky shores and sandy shores. It is threatened by habitat loss. == Sources == * Taylor, N.P. 2002. Pilosocereus arrabidae. 2006 IUCN Red List of Threatened Species. title: Pilosocereus arrabidae
